Package iiv.dialog

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChoiceDialog
    Class to display message, checkbox choices and wait for user response.
    CNUDialog
    Extends java.awt.Dialog performing some standard tasks.
    ColorDialog
    Dialog to handle color model requests from user.
    ContinueDialog
    Class to display message and wait for continue or cancel selection from user.
    ControlDialog
    ControlDialog is a Dialog window to control iiV settings
    CoordinateMapDialog
    Dialog to get coordinate map factors from user.
    CropDialog
    Dialog to get crop and other image limits from user.
    DataSlicerDialog
    Dialog to allow users to control data slicing.
    EditColorDialog
    Dialog to interactively edit color maps.
    FileTypeDialog
    Dialog that displays and gets file types and raw image information from the user.
    FilterDialog
    Dialog that interfaces with the user to display and get filter settings.
    FormatDialog
    FormatDialog is a dialog window for building text components to add to the display window.
    GotoPointDialog
    Dialog to get crop and other image limits from user.
    GridDialog
    Dialog to dislplay and get scale factors from the user.
    QueryDialog
    Class to display message and wait for user response.
    RegionDialog
    Dialog to get help select a region.
    SaveDialog
    Dialog to get save options from the user.
    ScaleDialog
    Dialog to get scale factors from user.
    ShapeDialog
    Dialog to allow user to display shapes.
    ShowMemoryDialog
    ShowMemoryDialog is a Dialog window to get scale factors from user.
    ShowPointDialog
    Dialog to display coordinate values and locations.
    StatusWindow
    Dialog Window to show status messages, error messages and allow user script command inputs.
    StatusWindowShowPointDisplay
    StatusWindowShowPointDisplay shows point info in a StatusWindow object.
    TextDialog
    TextDialog is a dialog window for building text components to add to the display window.
